REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0324 reute d f BC-EMS-SYSTEMS-<EMSIF>-I 03-04 0043

TEXT.TITLE: EMS SYSTEMS <EMSIF> IN MARKETING DEAL
TEXT.BODY: EMS Systems Ltd said it has signed an agreement for <Teleco USA Inc> to sell EMS' Six-Party Conference Bridge for telecommunications through the Teleco network of 150 dealers nationwide. Reuter
